audit_1.details: Audit security implementation, RLS policies, role-based access control, CI/CD pipeline, SSL, monitoring, and error tracking against the Infrastructure Phase requirements

audit_2.details: Evaluate invoice generation, payment processing, reporting dashboard, bulk operations, search/filtering, workflows, notifications, and document version control

audit_3.details: Assess form validation, AI claim intake, lead scoring, contact management, settlement tracking, task management, calendar integration, and client portal

audit_4.details: Review lead capture forms, scoring algorithms, email/SMS automation, referral systems, marketing tools, attribution tracking, and A/B testing framework

audit_5.details: Audit VoIP integration, SMS, email automation, video conferencing, communication trails, scheduling systems, and analytics

audit_6.details: Evaluate OCR, document extraction, settlement prediction, case analysis, task prioritization, chatbot, fraud detection, and predictive analytics

audit_7.details: Assess expense tracking, trust account management, fee schedules, financial reporting, QuickBooks/Xero integration, time tracking, and tax compliance

audit_8.details: Evaluate BI dashboard, custom report builder, performance monitoring, competitive analysis, satisfaction tracking, forecasting, and compliance reporting

audit_9.details: Review mobile responsiveness, native app capabilities, offline functionality, insurance carrier APIs, legal databases, and blockchain verification

audit_10.details: Synthesize all audit findings into a prioritized implementation roadmap with gap analysis, missing features identification, and recommended next steps
